name: PolyRage
description:
Video game with local multiplayer where you beat and face your friends in scenarios with different mechanics. The game and the characters have ragdoll physics to have a very funny experience (totally not plagiarized from another popular game).

Controls:

Left Stick → Move

A → Jump

B → Dive

X → Push

Y → Headbutt/Duck

A + Y → Headspin

Triggers → Punch

The game is still in early stages of development, so I ask you not to be too rough on the game. I welcome any kind of constructive criticism, feedback, ideas for scenarios or mechanics.
